column3: description
[General category] Clinical presentations of COVID-19
Descriptions of specific patient cases
Risk factors associated with case presentation,  serverity, or mortality
[General category] Disease assessment through symptoms, test results, and radiological features
Diagnosis based off clinical symptoms
Diagnosis based off of rapid testing procedures
Antibody-based detection
RT-PCR detection
Extent of testing
Diagnosis based off pathology and/or radiology
[General category] Modelling and estimating the trend of COVID-19 spread
[General category] Underlying cause(s) of covid-19 infections and transmission & possible drug mechanism of action
How virus factors influence infection and transmission
How host genetic factors influence infection and transmission
Description of immunological response upon virus exposure
Description of how the virus enters and infects human cells
Description of how the virus transmits between hosts
[General category] Prevention, control, and management strategies either at the individual or societal level
Descriptions of public health interventions and/or evaluations of their efficacy
Descriptions of individual transmission prevention methods and/or their efficacy, including behavior change campagins
Characteristics and modes of COVID-19 transmissions, such as human-to-human
Descriptions of the host source of SARS-CoV-2 and its spread through intermediate reservoirs
How much the virus sheds from host and how long it persists in environments
[General category] Treatment strategies, therapeutic procedures, and vaccine development
Vaccine development and immune response
Development of new pharmaceutical treatments of COVID-19, especially small molecule development
Repurposing candidates of approved drugs
Development of biologically based treatments of COVID-19, including the use of convalescent plasma
Medical interventions or procedures to treat COVID-19 such as dialysis, ventilators, etc.
[General category] Description of the spread of cases
Description of chains of transmission, R0, doubling time, dating outbreak in specific regions/overall based on molecular/genetic assays
Description of cases, chains of transmission, broader scale dynamics (R0, doubling time, duration of infectiousness,...) based on classical epidemilogical methods like case counts and contact tracing
[General category] Mental health, behavioral, or social science research directly or indirectly related to COVID-19
